question: If A + B means A is the father of B, A - B means A is the mother of B, A * B means A is the brother of B, and A / B means A is the sister of B, what does P - Q / R mean?
options: P is the mother of R
P is the sister of R
P is the mother of Q and sister of R
P is the mother of Q and R
correct_answer: P is the mother of Q and sister of R
